TOKENSVISIBLE.SelectHotKeyHelp: When floating the mouse cursor over a token that is obstructing your view of other tokens, pressing this key will push the token to the bottom of the render stack, allowing you to access any tokens which were beneath it.
TOKENSVISIBLE.colorPickerDefaultHint: Reduce color alpha channel to 0 to use default
TOKENSVISIBLE.autopanningMarginHint: Trigger automatic panning whenever tokens move closer than this margin towards the edge of canvas.
TOKENSVISIBLE.hiddenCanLightHint: Should Hidden Tokens be able to radiate light?
TOKENSVISIBLE.wallsCancelAnimationHint: Token Movement Animation may cause tokens to appear to fly over walls when the GM relocates them to another part of the map. This can reveal parts of the map the GM does not intend to.
TOKENSVISIBLE.castRaysHint: Improve the accuracy used to calculate lines of token vision and ambient illumination at the expense of greater CPU usage.
TOKENSVISIBLE.castRayshotkeyHint: To momentarily improve ray casting to view a particular scene, toggle through the modes without changing your settings.
TOKENSVISIBLE.sightCachehotkey: Sight Calculations Cache - Toggle Hotkey (case sensitive)
TOKENSVISIBLE.sightCachehotkeyHint: There is no good reason to toggle the SightCache except to experiment with the performance boost.
TOKENSVISIBLE.sightCacheHint: Improve performance by making Foundry VTT cache line of sight and field of view calculations.
TOKENSVISIBLE.sightCacheOff: Cache is OFF (Standard Foundry VTT calculations)
TOKENSVISIBLE.panModeHint: Control how the canvas pans to keep a moving token in view.
TOKENSVISIBLE.panModeRecenter: Recenter the view around the token if it passes the Automatic Pan Margin.
TOKENSVISIBLE.panModeScroll: Scroll the view when needed to reclaim the Automatic Pan Margin.
TOKENSVISIBLE.combatantHiddenHint: Cause new Combatants to enter the Combat Tracker as Hidden. By default new Combatants use their Token's Hidden state.
TOKENSVISIBLE.combatantHiddenHostile: Hostile Combatants enter combat hidden. Others use standard behavior.
TOKENSVISIBLE.combatantHiddenNeutral: Hostile and Neutral Combatants enter combat hidden. Others use standard behavior.
TOKENSVISIBLE.tokenAnimationSpeedHint: Controls how fast tokens move during animated movement. Higher numbers save electricity and time by rendering less frames during animation. Standard Foundry Speed is 10.
